command.text:
&Tiny.External.Import.Command;
declare @xSplit bit, @compactMode char(1) &ControlLocationLotLoading; set @xSplit = 1 end if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_compact_mode' and val = '1') select @compactMode = '1' else select @compactMode = '0' &ExportImportTemplateQuery; if isnull(@xSplit, 0) <> 1 if @compactMode = 1 select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else begin if @xSplit = 1 begin select case when @$location = 0 and @$Lot = 0 then 1 when @$location = 1 and @$Lot = 0 then 2 when @$location = 0 and @$Lot = 1 then 3 when @$location = 1 and @$Lot = 1 then 0 end as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; end end

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; đã tồn tại.' else '&s2; already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), dvt = case when a.dvt <> '' then a.dvt else b.dvt end, &UnitUpload.General; ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk_du = case when a.tk_du <> '' then a.tk_du else c.tk end, tk_vt = case when a.tk_vt <> '' then a.tk_vt else b.tk_vt end from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmnx c on a.ma_nx = c.ma_nx select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from c&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct from @@table a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho group by b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct -- Checking @@checking(1); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; select @field = 'ma_kho' if @admin <> 1 begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00001' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)) &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1))&Error; end &SiteRight; end @@checking(2); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_luong', stt, 'invalidValueMessage' from @@table a join dmmagd t on a.ma_gd = t.ma_gd and t.ma_ct = @voucherID where a.so_luong = 0 and t.loai_ct <> '7' and exists(select 1 from dmvt b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.gia_ton = 3) &w1;'so_luong'&w2;stt&w3;'invalidValueMessage'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'so_luong', @r = min(stt) from @@table a join dmmagd t on a.ma_gd = t.ma_gd and t.ma_ct = @voucherID where a.so_luong = 0 and t.loai_ct <> '7' and exists(select 1 from dmvt b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.gia_ton = 3)&Error; end &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.dvt, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, a.gia, a.tien_nt, a.tien, a.px_gia_dd, a.tk_vt, a.tk_du, a.ma_nx, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 a, dmvt b insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, round(a.gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.px_gia_dd, a.tk_vt, a.tk_du, a.ma_nx, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt update #d&Detail; set he_so = b.he_so from #d&Detail; a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 update #d&Detail; set tk_vt = c.tk_dl from #d&Detail; a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt where b.dai_ly_yn = 1 and c.tk_dl <> '' select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, loai_ct, ma_kh, ma_gd, ong_ba, dien_giai, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_so_luong, t_tien_nt, t_tien into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, c.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, e.loai_ct, a.ma_kh, a.ma_gd, a.ong_ba, a.dien_giai, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_so_luong, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join (select stt_rec, sum(so_luong) as t_so_luong, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec join (select ma_gd, min(loai_ct) as loai_ct from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID group by ma_gd) e on a.ma_gd = e.ma_gd select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, e$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_gd) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '', '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_kho, ma_vt, tk_vt, ma_nx', '#10$, #20$, #30$, #40$', 'stt_rec', default, default, 'PXA', 'e$', 1) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert declare @p varchar(32), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting; if @status <> '0' begin declare @Statement nvarchar(4000) select @Statement = 'update #in set ngay_lct = ngay_ct, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ' from #in ' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostInventory '#m&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', @voucherID, '#k', 'gia_nt0, tien_nt0, gia0, tien0, gia01, gia_nt01, ct_dc, pn_gia_tb, cp_nt, cp, thue_suat_nk, nk_nt, nk, gia_nt21, gia21, gia_nt2, gia2, tien_nt2, tien2, cp_thue_yn, thue_suat, thue_nt, thue, ck_nt, ck, nam, ky, cp_vc, cp_bh, cp_khac, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', 'so_seri, ma_khon, tk_gv, tk_dt, tk_thue_nk, ma_tt, tk_thue_no, tk_thue_co, tk_ck, so_dh2, so_dh3, ma_nvbh, stt_rec_px, stt_rec0px, stt_rec_dc, so_ct0, so_seri0, ma_nk, stt_rec_pn, stt_rec0pn, stt_rec_yc, stt_rec0yc, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3, so_lo', 'gia_nt1 = b.gia_nt, gia1 = b.gia, tien_nhap = 0, tien_nt_n = 0, tien_xuat = b.tien, tien_nt_x = b.tien_nt', @Statement, 0, 2 end if @status = '2' begin declare @fieldSelect varchar(4000) select @fieldSelect = 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ''' + @voucherID + ''' , ngay_ct, so_ct, t_tien_nt , t_tien, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai,''' + @datetime0 + ''',' + rtrim(@user) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostLater '#m&Detail;', @voucherID, @fieldSelect, '' end if @status = '3' begin declare @glGroup varchar(128), @glAcctField varchar(128), @glAcctFieldRef varchar(128), @glAmountField varchar(128), @glFCAmountField varchar(128), @glKey varchar(512), @glNoAccList varchar(128), @glNoAccListRef varchar(128) declare @Numeric nvarchar(4000), @String nvarchar(4000), @External nvarchar(4000), @cNoAccounts varchar(128) select @cNoAccounts = replace(rtrim(val), '''', '''''') from options where name = 'm_tk_tk_vt' select @glAcctField = 'tk_du', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk_vt', @glAmountField = 'tien', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt', @glKey = '1 = 1', @glNoAccList = '0', @glNoAccListRef = '0' select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_nk, so_lo, ma_gd, so_dh, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3', @External = 'ong_ba = b.ong_ba, dien_giai_h = b.dien_giai, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user), @Statement = '' select @glGroup = groupby from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherID select a.*, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, @voucherID as ma_ct, b.loai_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, b.ma_nt, b.ty_gia, b.dien_giai as dien_giai, b.dien_giai as dien_giai_h into #dGL from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where (a.tk_vt <> a.tk_du) and (not (@cNoAccounts <> '' and dbo.ff_inlist(tk_du, @cNoAccounts) = 1)) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, @glGroup, @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k' end
